mapper.select: SELECT 'L' as tp, NULL as userName, MAX_ATT_LIMIT as attendFg FROM TBL_SCHEDULE WHERE ID = #{schId} UNION ALL SELECT 'M' AS tp, USERNAME as userName, ATTEND_FG as attendFg FROM TBL_USERS A LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_ATTEND B ON A.USERID = B.USERID AND B.SCHID = #{schId} UNION ALL SELECT 'G' AS TP, GUEST_NM, '1' AS ATTEND_FG FROM TBL_ATTEND_GUEST WHERE SCHID = #{schId} ORDER BY TP, USERNAME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_attend (SCHID, USERID, ATTEND_FG, ATT_REG_DT) VALUES (#{schId}, #{userId}, ${attendFg}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ATTEND_FG = ${attendFg}, ATT_REG_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()
INSERT INTO tbl_attend_guest(SCHID, GUEST_NM, ATT_REG_DT, USERID, GRADE, AGE, GENDER) VALUES (#{schId}, #{guestNm}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{userId}, #{grade}, ${age}, #{gender})
